State.Description: This support mod allows integration of custom armors and outfits included in other mods in the new cosmetics/wardrobe system. State.Author: LittleRedSonja
State.Description: Makes the Chainsaw into a weapon of mass destruction when wearing lumberjack set, increasing damage, damage resistance, fuel capacity and attack speed. Tweaked stats to make it as balanced as possible while making the chainsaw powerful and fun to use. Become the king of badassery in the zombie apocalypse!
State.Name: Navezgane Chainsaw Massacre

State.Author: LittleRedSonja
State.Description: This mod adds several new T3 weapons converted from T2 weapons. Keep look, animations and sounds of the T2 weapons but get upgraded stats and new features. Weapon stats are tweaked and tested to make it as balanced as possible, while keeping it fun. IT DOES NOT REPLACE THE VANILLA WEAPONS, but it adds several new weapons instead.
State.Name: LittleRedSonja T2 into T3 grade weapons

Adds 2 working boats to the game, the Dinghy and Flat bottomed Boat.

State.Author: arramus
State.Description:
The (V2) NPC Mod Prefabs mod is an Add On Pack for the NPC Mod.

It includes sample POIs that demonstrate how other Add On Packs will automatically use NPC Mod custom sleeper volumes when hooked up appropriately.

The NPC Mod provides fall back entities to replace Add On Pack entities where they are not available.
State.Name: (V2) NPC Mod Prefabs (NPC Mod Add On Pack)

State.Author: Oakraven - arramus
State.Description:
This mod is brought to the community by Oakraven (models and code) and arramus (code and quality control).

The (V1) Oakraven Cement Mixer mod provides an upgraded Cement Mixer that allows us to make Bulk Concrete in Stacks with only 70% of the resources in 70% of the time.
State.Name: (V1) Oakraven Cement Mixer

State.Author: Oakraven - arramus
State.Description: (V1) Oakraven Power Things mod provides an additional set of devices to power your electrical system. Collect Rocks and Crystal in the Burnt Forest and Wasteland to craft Power Cells and Solar Cells. Add them to Oakraven Generators and Solar Arrays for greater power and more efficiency.
State.Name: (V1) Oakraven Power Things

State.Author: Xyth and arramus
State.Description:
The (V2) Spider Colony Expansion Pack is an Add On Pack for the NPC Mod.

It was created by Xyth, an NPC Mod lead member, and expanded by arramus.

It was originally two separate mods, but bundled to be more user friendly.
State.Name: (V2) Spider Colony Expansion Pack (NPC Mod Add On Pack)

*Updated* to 1.0+



I don't see any reason these wouldn't work on 1.1, 1.2, 1.3 etc.  Lemme know though.



Three packs of new zombies to populate the world.  Pack 3 randomizes the look of zombies, giving you a much larger range of variety.
State.Name: Guppycur's Zombies (REAL)

State.Description:
Halicopter is a new drone that can return to your base to drop items off for you while you carry on exploring.



Place a Halipad at your base, fill him up and ask him to go home. The bags of loot will be waiting for you when you get back (hopefully)

State.Description:
More than 140 new deco blocks, workstations, lamps, powered lights, neon lights, crops, ingredients, foods, drinks, weapons, hats, safe storage and much more, all inspired by Christmas. 

It also includes Christmas music played by musical elves, custom sounds, tweaks to some vanilla features, , world loot, air drops, game events and much more!.
State.Name: LittleRedSonja Christmas Is Coming

This is a Mod - and should be installed in your Appdata Mod Folder.  For Multiplayer, it must be installed both server and client side.  This will require generating a new Random Map.

State.Description: Adds new power class and block for a modern windmill that produces energy day and night by wind power. Although wind is unpredictable, it still runs at around 50% capacity most of the time. Highly adviced to be used with a battery bank. You need to disable EAC to use this mod!
State.Name: OCB Electricity Wind Power (V2.X)

WARNING:- This mod should only be added to a new world because it replaces the default nests.

The mod is for V1 or later versions of 7 days to die.
